ValidationRule.description: BODEV-3409: Users cannot add Figma Connector product to New Business or Upsell Opportunities.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), ISNEW(), Quantity >0, OR( TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business-Enterprise Cloud", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "Existing Business-Upsell", TEXT(Opportunity.Type) = "New Business - Expansion Portal" ), Product2.Product_ID_18_digits__c = '01t3g000000SAEaAAO' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot add Figma Connector product to New business or Upsell opportunities.
